tool_description: This API allows you to generate QR codes and barcodes as images. Choose between QR code and barcode generation, customize colors, add logos, and control image dimensions.
name: Custom QrCode And BarCode Generator Api
title: Custom QrCode And BarCode Generator Api
tool_name: Custom QrCode And BarCode Generator Api

api_list.name: GenerateCodeImage
api_list.description: Generate QR codes or barcodes as images.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: The data you want to encode in the QR code or barcode
